description:
For more than 30 years, the award-winning personal injury lawyers at Janet, Jenner & Suggs have been dedicated to uncovering wrongdoing and fighting for the justice injury victims deserve.

No matter the size of your case, we know the devastating impact a preventable injury can have on you and your family. That is why we are committed to fighting for the maximum compensation you need to get back on your feet after an accident or injury caused by another’s actions. We have obtained substantial verdicts and settlements, many in record-breaking amounts, on behalf of our clients and will not stop unless you receive the amount you deserve.

Our attorneys and our firm have been recognized nationwide for our commitment to advocating for our clients. Led by award winning attorneys in medical malpractice, personal injury, and product liability, as well as an OBGYN who is also a partner at the firm, we have routinely found success litigating cases other law firms have rejected. Trust us to represent you in your case.

Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you.
